reviewText: Definitely a collectable and I was glad that I found this VHS.

I rented this movie over ten years ago. Love the acting of Jamieson Boulanger and Ricky Mabe. I believe Burt Reynolds was also in this movie. The two boys intend to reincarnate Frankenstein. It is a good kid flick. I think I would buy it if it were ever for sale at amazon.com.
Received within a week, good condition as stated, very satisfied with the service. Thank you.
This is just a great movie - Well done, and has a social value in it for kids and adults.
